articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Australian woman is sentenced to life for poisoning relatives with mushrooms - NPR
articles.description: An Australian judge sentenced triple-murderer Erin Patterson to life in prison with a non-parole period of 33 years for poisoning four of her estranged husband's relatives with death cap mushrooms.
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia An Australian judge on Monday sentenced triple-murderer Erin Patterson to life in prison with a non-parole period of 33 years for poisoning four of her estranged husband's relati… [+4814 chars]
